name: Saying Hello
description:
Two kids meet and become fast friends. As time goes on, however, our protagonist struggles to keep their friendship alive. Experience the protagonist’s struggle both in the real world and within their mind.

Saying Hello is team Gamer Buddies' submission for the 2021 College Game Jam.
